metadata.title: CVE-2022-3594 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - negligible
metadata.description: A vulnerability was found in Linux Kernel. It has been declared asproblematic. Affected by this vulnerability is the function intr_callbackof the file drivers/net/usb/r8152.c of the component BPF. The manipulationleads to logging of excessive data. The attack can be launched remotely. Itis recommended to apply a patch to fix this issue. The associatedidentifier of this vulnerability is VDB-211363.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
